field.name: Home Care for Diarrhoea with Some Dehydration | Take Action: First 4-Hour Period
If the mother must leave before completing treatment:
Determine amount of ORS to give during the first 4 hour period
Show her how to prepare ORS at home
Show her how to give ORS in the first 4 hours:
Give frequent small sips from a clean cup
If the child vomits, wait 10 minutes. Then continue, but more slowly.
If the baby wants more ORS than recommended, give more
